wikipedia_page.main: Dwayne Wright (born 25 January 1989) is a Caymanian footballer who plays as a forward. He has represented the Cayman Islands during a World Cup qualifying match in 2011.

response: Dwayne Wright (born June 2, 1983) is a former American football Running back. He was drafted by the Buffalo Bills in the fourth round of the 2007 NFL Draft. He played college football at Fresno State.
